name: Shadow Reborn (Skill Card)
text:
Yami Marik / Skill
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Skill Effect ]
Activate this Skill during your Main Phase.
Once per Duel, you can pay half your LP and Special Summon 1 monster from either GY, but your opponent takes no battle damage this turn.
